job.title: Senior Project Manager
job.industry: Electrical/Electronic Manufacturing,Information Technology and Services,Computer Software
job.description: We continue to experience rapid growth as we invest in resources and create new opportunities, as a result, we have exciting opportunities for a to join our PMO team in Seeking a talented and experienced Sr. Software Engineering Project Manager to make a difference and be part of a collaborative team that works to build innovative products. In this position, you will be responsible for managing large and small technical programs across various software groups within the organization. The ideal candidate will have a proven track record of successfully planning and executing complex product development programs from concept to launch.
